1.name: The Arcane Grimoire
1.description: An ancient spellbook writes a new page.
1.prompt: Read the book on your TBR the longest.
1.reward: Temp buff: Long Read Focus (+10 Ink Drops per 100 pages over 300).

2.name: The Blood Fury Tattoo
2.description: Inked markings blaze across your skin.
2.prompt: Read a book featuring a counter culture rebellion.

3.name: The Bag of Holding
3.description: A battered satchel yawns impossibly wide.
3.prompt: Read a story with multiple POVs.

4.name: The Wandering Merchant's Request
4.description: A traveler draped in scarves greets you.
4.prompt: Read a book featuring a journey.

5.name: The Glimmering Pools' Gift
5.description: A nymph rises from glowing waters.
5.reward: Roll a die: on even gain an Amulet of Duality; on odd gain one Worn Page curse.

6.name: The Chime of Opening
6.description: A silver chime hums with anticipation.
6.prompt: Read a book where a long-hidden truth is revealed.
6.reward: Receive a Key of the Archive.

7.name: The Scarecrow's Cornfield
7.description: Rustling stalks and a grim figure loom.
7.prompt: Read a book with an unreliable narrator.
7.reward: Temp buff: Disjointed Perception (+10 Ink Drops, +5 Page Scraps).

8.name: The Empty Shelf
8.description: A hollow space on the stacks calls out.
8.prompt: Choose a book from your TBR you are most excited for.
